abstract: New York City settles sexual harassment lawsuit filed by female police officers Dawn Sprague, Claudia Melara and Maria Lampley against former lieutenant Alexander Rojas after city's Law Dept withdraws from defending Rojas due to admissions he made in deposition; Rojas will contribute $12,500 towards $1.25 million settlement.
lead_paragraph: The city agreed to pay $1.25 million to settle the lawsuit, which accused Lt. Alexander Rojas of groping the officers.

headline.main: New York City Settles Harassment Suit by 3 Female Police Officers
headline.print_headline: City Settles Harassment Suit by 3 Female Police Officers

snippet: The city agreed to pay $1.25 million to settle the lawsuit, which accused Lt. Alexander Rojas of groping the officers.
